component.name: Switcher control
component.summary: Control application for Blackmagic Design ATEM video switchers

description.p: Switcher is a re-implementation of the Switcher Control application from Blackmagic Design for controlling the ATEM video mixers/switchers like the popular Atem Mini.

ul.li: Basic video switching and configuration implemented
Volume and mute/afv control for switchers with fairlight audio
